      <script>
            var random_images_array = new Array ( );
            var random_images_array_mobile = new Array ( );
            
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                
                
                        var count_number = parseInt(1) - 1;
      
                        random_images_array[count_number] = ["http://www.davidhockney.co/img/gallery/home_images/09A12-l.jpg", "May Blossom on the Roman Road - 2009"];
             
                
                
             } else {
                 
                
                        var count_number = parseInt(1) - 1;
                   
                        random_images_array[count_number] = ["http://www.davidhockney.co/img/gallery/home_images/80A37.jpg", "Nichols Canyon, 1980"];
                
            
            }
        
        
        function getRandomImage(imgAr, path) {
            path = path || 'images/'; // default path here
            var num = Math.floor( Math.random() * imgAr.length );
            var img = imgAr[ num ][0];
            var home_caption = imgAr[ num ][1];
            var imgStr = '<img data-original="' + img + '" alt = "" class="img-responsive lazy-image">';
                imgStr += '<div class="caption">'+ home_caption +'</div>';
            document.write(imgStr); document.close();
        }
    
    
      </script>

    	<div class="container">
      		<main class="main-content">
        		<script>
                        getRandomImage(random_images_array);
                </script>
                <noscript>
                    <img src="/img/nav/grandcanyon_home.jpg" class="img-responsive" />
                    <div class="caption">"A Bigger Grand Canyon" 1998 oil on 60 canvases, 81 x 291 in. overall</div>
                </noscript>
            	
      		</main>
		</div>

  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

  ga('create', 'UA-100026788-2', 'auto');
  ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>
